traits.name: Hardened Exterior
traits.desc: Bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage the corlapis takes from nonmagical weapons is reduced by 3 to a minimum of 1.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The corlapis's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: light, earth tremor, mold earth * 1/day each: erupting earth, heat metal, meld into stone

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.desc: The corlapis has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

traits.name: Sturdy
traits.desc: The corlapis has advantage on saving throws against effects that would cause it to move or be knocked prone.

actions.name: War Pick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
